sentences.en: As Father Ralph came in holding Meggie's hand, her malevolent gaze beat the child's down.
sentences.cn: 当拉尔夫神父拉着麦琪的手走进来时, 她那恶毒的眼光马上压倒了孩子.

sentences.en: But anyway, fan club will back, liar's malevolent schemes will failed!
sentences.cn: 但不管怎样, 影迷会会回来, 骗子的奸计不会得逞!

sentences.en: But those strikeouts are malevolent surgery.
sentences.cn: 但是这些失败是恶意的外科手术.

sentences.en: Failure made him malevolent toward those who were successful.
sentences.cn: 失败使他对那些成功的人充满了恶意.

sentences.en: Fortunately, they can be beaten, as indicated by the liberation of the Procyon people from these malevolent, self centered, self-serving... life draining entities.
sentences.cn: 幸运的是，它们被击败，我们被南河三人从这些恶毒的、自私自利的、以自我为中心的......生命枯竭的实体手中解放。

sentences.en: Haindl's malevolent face twists in surprise.

sentences.en: Her stare was malevolent, her mouth a thin line.

sentences.cn: 她凝视的目光含有恶意.

sentences.en: His glittering eyes were cold and malevolent.
sentences.cn: 他发光的眼睛冰冷、恶毒.

sentences.en: If we fail in our task as creators, they may indeed be cold and malevolent.
sentences.cn: 如果我们作为创作者的工作失败了, 那它们也许确实会变得冷酷而恶毒.

sentences.en: The cat stared at him from its corners, malevolent and unblinking.
sentences.cn: 猫在角落里看着他, 眼睛一眨不眨,怀有恶意.

sentences.en: The good news is that the malevolent antics of the evolution establishment are finally being exposed.
sentences.cn: 好消息是,生物进化论共同体这些恶意的古怪表现终于被揭露出来.

sentences.en: The tiger stared at him from its corners, malevolent and unblinking.
sentences.cn: 老虎在角落里眼睛一眨不眨地看着他, 不怀好意.

sentences.en: Their presence was both gentle and malevolent.
sentences.cn: 他们的出现是既温和的且有恶意的.

sentences.en: We must thwart his malevolent schemes.
sentences.cn: 我们决不能让他的恶毒阴谋得逞.

sentences.en: Why are they so malevolent to me?
sentences.cn: 他们为什么对我如此恶毒?
